body_html:
Likely right. Best would be to install pytorch and caffe2 together either from source (recommended) or with one of our new binary installs. cc @pjh5 on whether those are ready yet. For source build do

pip uninstall torch # repeat until there is nothing left
pip uninstall caffe2 # repeat until there is nothing left
conda uninstall caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7
conda uninstall pytorch
git clone ...
FULL_CAFFE2=1 python setup.py install

body:
Likely right. Best would be to install pytorch and caffe2 together either from source (recommended) or with one of our new binary installs. cc @pjh5 on whether those are ready yet. For source build do

```
pip uninstall torch # repeat until there is nothing left
pip uninstall caffe2 # repeat until there is nothing left
conda uninstall caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7
conda uninstall pytorch
git clone ...
FULL_CAFFE2=1 python setup.py install
```
